system.description:
At 20th level, your secret inner divinity is finally revealed. You can use your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.s4iiatrup3e3virw]{Channel Divinity} to become a conduit of the divine, flooding the world around you with the unfettered power of the Moral Planes. Once you have used either of these options, you cannot use that option again until you finish a long rest.

 

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.dcob44rq7qf4vqo2]{Faith: Channel Negative Energy}
